header.title: phpBB Gallery
header.description: This is a gallery for your phpBB3. It's based on the album MOD of smartor. The basement was developed by tsr. But since 0.1.2 I'm the only developer. For Features see the forum topic.
header.author-notes: i hope you get it installed, otherwise you can ask for help on phpbb.de and phpbb.com
